text: Ðis synd ðara syx sulunga landgemæra to Bromleage.
Ærest on eastan Cyselhyrstes gemæra; ðonne on Croptunes gemæra; ðonne ðanon on Rugebeorges gemæra; ðonne on suðhealfe Cyssestanes gemæra, forð be weardsetlan.
Ðonne be westan Wichames gemæra and be Ohhahames gemæra; ðonne be norðan Beringahames gemæra and Modingahammes gemæra; and ðanon eft east on cynges gemæra; ðæt on Cyselhyrst.

Haec utilitas siluarum ad eandem terram pertinetin Andrede, Billanoran, be Lindhyrste, and on Gleppanfelda, Scearnden, and ðæs ryhte wið ðornden, and Broccesham be eastan ea, and Tannerahole, and Trinhyrst.
